```{r}
setwd('/Volumes/Documents-1/R_onAir/EGF_gage analysis/')

# check correlation between pairs of replicates using scatter plot
pairs(ws, cex.labels=.5, pch=20)
# check correlation using cor
cor(ws)
require(gplots)
heatmap.2(cor(ws),trace='none')
```
